title: owncloud sync fails on very long file names (probably server issue, but not sure)
body:
hi,

in my test data i do have a very long file name:

torben@atlantis:~/documents/judior/synctest/draft$ ls -l 11*
-rw-r--r-- 1 torben users 1276 jul 20  2012 11 am abendbevor er aãÿ, dankte er der untergehenden sonne fã¼r den schutz, die sie ihm gegeben hatte. auch dieser reisetag war ereignislos verlaufen. morgen wã¼rde sich das ã¤ndern, dessen war er sich sicher. thã¡riand hatte nicht die gerings... -64-.rtf

(the name is autogenerated by a novell writing tool, i cannot easly limit its length).

when the sync client (linux v1.4) tries to sync this against my oc installation (5.0.10) i am getting a bad request error:

217.94.162.118 - - [13/sep/2013:08:21:17 +0200] "put /remote.php/webdav/documents/judior/synctest/draft/11%20am%20abendb
evor%20er%20a%c3%9f%2c%20dankte%20er%20der%20untergehenden%20sonne%20f%c3%bcr%20den%20schutz%2c%20die%20sie%20ihm%20gege
ben%20hatte.%20auch%20dieser%20reisetag%20war%20ereignislos%20verlaufen.%20morgen%20w%c3%bcrde%20sich%20das%20%c3%a4nder
n%2c%20dessen%20war%20er%20sich%20sicher.%20th%c3%a1riand%20hatte%20nicht%20die%20gerings...%20-64-.rtf http/1.1" 400 27
0 "-" "mozilla/5.0 (linux) csyncoc/0.90.0 neon/0.29.6"
